title: JSON Schema for GenshinCalc 'itemDB' object.
description: Items Database. Various properties may be applied to individual items within. See itemGroups.json for more.

title.description: Used as a replacement name when displaying the name.

rarity.description: The item's rarity. Affects background and star count. Leave unset for a rarity of 0.

type.description: The category the item will fall into.

source.description: Where you can get the item. This shows up in a tooltip if set.

region.description: Which region the item can be found in. Currently does nothing.
